home.bio: I am Ariel Nogueroles, passionate about programming and cybersecurity. I come from the world of metallurgy, where I learned discipline and precision, and now I apply that same dedication to software development.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: My professional career began in a very different field from technology. I served in the army, where I developed strong discipline and a great sense of responsibility. Later, I worked in the metallurgy industry, a sector that taught me the importance of precision and attention to detail.
about.paragraph2: However, my true passion was always technology. I decided to make a career change and entered the world of programming and cybersecurity. Today, I apply the same dedication and rigor that I learned in my previous experiences to build quality software and protect systems.
